entry.title: $2335 // Luxury Full service 1 bedroom in the middle of everything you need
entry.content:
Unit Features:
-Large windows and open interiors
-Efficient cooling/heating systems
-Built-in Bluetooth speakers and video intercom
-Wide-plank white oak flooring, designer tiles, high ceilings and ample closet space
-Most units feature private outdoor space
-Kitchens feature stainless steel appliances, soft-close glass cabinetry and sparkling porcelain backsplashes.
-Bathrooms are outfitted with deep-soaking tubs, sleek chrome fittings, beautiful tiles and medicine cabinets.

Building Amenities:
-Business center, Conference rooms, Creative studios
-Laundry room
-Fitness center including climbing and yoga studio
-Cafeteria
-Roof Deck and Courtyard
-Dog Run and Pet Spa

Studios from $1950~
1 Bedrooms from $2330~
2 Bedrooms from $3400~

60 + units available. Easy and fast approval thru online
Schedule a showing today with Nalae
NO FEE!
